titles: A catechism truly representing the doctrines and practices of the Church of Rome, with an answer thereunto by a Protestant of the Church of England.
author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.
notes: The "reply to the answer of the Amicable accommodation" appears in the "Postscript": [5] p. at end.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Gother, John, d. 1704. --  An amicable accommodation of the difference between the representer and the answerer.
